title: Tau exposure reveals how synapses unravel over time
summary: New research maps the slow cascade from brief tau toxicity to lasting synaptic dysfunction, offering a more dynamic view of neurodegeneration. For decades, Alzheimer’s research has been dominated by accumulation stories: plaques building, tangles spreading, pathology advancing in space.
